abstract: Building Blocks column; Pier A in New York Harbor, which was shut to public for many years, is now accessible for first time in decades following restoration; site now includes the Pier A Harbor House restaurant.
lead_paragraph: For the first time in many years, the public is welcome on Pier A, which will include restaurants and bars after being rehabilitated by the Battery Park City Authority.
snippet: For the first time in many years, the public is welcome on Pier A, which will include restaurants and bars after being rehabilitated by the Battery Park City Authority.

keywords.value: Pier A Harbor House (Manhattan, NY, Restaurant)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Envisioned for Decades, a Revival of a Manhattan Pier Is Complete
headline.print_headline: Envisioned for Decades, a Revival of a Manhattan Pier Is Complete
